summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight pH deviation and temperature drop.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5; consider adding pH buffers if it continues to drop.
Monitor TDS levels; ensure they remain within the optimal range for tilapia (300-500 ppm).
Keep temperature between 24-28°C; consider heating if it drops further.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.036 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 319.021 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 26.236 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
